backend/main.mo: Defines core backend actor with user profiles, listings, bookings, and access control, integrating storage, Stripe, and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata describing implemented features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries of multiple frontend components, pages, and configs for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base variables for light and dark themes with color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO metadata, Open Graph tags, and updated Tech Neon branding assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main React app with TanStack Router routes, theme provider, and React Query client.
frontend/src/components/AvailabilityCoun: Displays live availability counts for different property types with loading skeletons and animated counters.
frontend/src/components/BookingSteps.tsx: Shows a three-step booking flow with animated cards tailored to the selected listing category.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedListings: Fetches and displays featured property listings with skeletons and rotating visual variants.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, legal links, and social/contact info.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the main site header with navigation, authentication actions, and admin/user options.
Shows an India map with animated city markers indicating active and coming-soon locations.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps the app layout with header, footer, routed content, and optional profile-setup modal.
frontend/src/components/ListingCard.tsx: Displays a property card with availability, rating, category icons, and style variants, allowing navigation to detailed view.
frontend/src/components/ListingCard3D.ts: Renders a 3D‑styled property card with hover animations, rating info, and availability indicators.
frontend/src/components/ListingDetailMod: Empty file or placeholder for a listing detail modal component.
frontend/src/components/MapSection.tsx: Shows an animated map section with event markers, floating badges, and styled map pins.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile with form fields, validation, and profile save mutation.
frontend/src/components/PropertyStatusBa: Displays a status badge for a property with icons and styling based on its status value.
frontend/src/components/ReviewSection.ts: Handles listing reviews, including display, adding new reviews, and rating selection.
frontend/src/components/StarRating.tsx: Reusable star rating component supporting interactive rating and size variations.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialBubbl: Empty file or placeholder for a testimonial bubbles component.
frontend/src/components/TrustBadge.tsx: A memoized badge component that renders styled SVG gradients and optional icons based on variant and size.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React Query hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of data-fetching and mutation hooks using React Query to interact with backend listings, profiles, reviews, and related entities.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup with custom OKLCH color variables, typography, and animation definitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, QueryClientProvider, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUsPage.tsx: A styled About Us page displaying company info, registration details, and leadership profiles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page that loads admin-only data, handles quick-publish actions, notification management, free‑trial toggles, and city charge updates.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPolicyPage.tsx: Static booking policy page displaying platform disclaimers, dispute terms, and related informational sections.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryWorldPage.tsx: Category browsing page listing accommodation types with images and navigating users to filtered listings.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showcasing category cards, stay types, and interactive sections with lazy-loaded map and availability components.
frontend/src/pages/ListingPage.tsx: Listings page that filters listings by category, loads them via API hooks, and displays results with lazy-loaded map and cards.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders a styled privacy policy page with sections describing data use, collection, and user privacy commitments.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays and edits the logged‑in user's profile with identity checks, form fields, save logic, and logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/PropertyManagementPag: Allows authenticated owners to create, edit, and manage property listings with form dialogs and backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPropertySubmiss: Provides a public form for submitting property listings with validation, image upload handling, and submission to backend.
frontend/src/pages/RefundPolicyPage.tsx: Shows a styled refund policy page explaining conditions for refund eligibility for the unlock fee.
frontend/src/pages/TermsConditionsPage.t: Renders a styled Terms & Conditions page with sections for platform disclaimers and other legal content using scrollable layout and themed UI components.
frontend/src/pages/UnlockPage.tsx: Displays listing details with gated contact info, handling unlock requests, downloads, calling, and WhatsApp actions while enforcing user login.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query strings and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining custom colors, shadows, animations, and container settings with plugin integration.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, logo asset needs, and architectural notes for branding and badge components.
